text:
Hi everyone! Merry Christmas!
Help! Do you know how to calculate the diagonal of the hessian matrix in a Neural Network ?

elements.text:
Hi everyone! Merry Christmas!
Help! Do you know how to calculate the diagonal of the hessian matrix in a Neural Network ?

text: The diagonal of the Hessian is just the second derivatives to each input, yes? Maybe check out ForwardDiff.jl
